name: eXp World Holdings, Inc.
description: eXp World Holdings, Inc. is a leading cloud-based real estate brokerage that operates on a virtual platform, revolutionizing the way real estate is conducted. Founded in 2009 by Glenn Sanford, eXp Realty has rapidly expanded to become one of the largest residential real estate brokerages in the United States. The company leverages innovative technology to offer agents and brokers a unique and flexible way to work and collaborate in a virtual environment. eXp Realty provides its agents with a comprehensive suite of tools and services, including training, marketing support, and a collaborative virtual workspace, all designed to enhance productivity and efficiency. The brokerage operates under a cloud-based model, allowing real estate professionals to work from anywhere, breaking the traditional barriers of physical office locations. eXp World Holdings also operates eXp Commercial and a range of other subsidiaries, further diversifying its offerings. With a strong commitment to agent-centric practices and a focus on technology, eXp Realty is redefining the real estate landscape and empowering agents to succeed in a competitive market. The company has a global reach, with operations extending beyond the United States to Canada, the United Kingdom, and several other international markets.

seo.meta_title: eXp World Holdings, Inc. | Cloud-Based Real Estate Brokerage
seo.meta_description: Explore eXp World Holdings, Inc., a leader in cloud-based real estate. Discover innovative solutions and services that redefine the real estate industry.

faq.question: What is eXp Realty?
faq.answer: eXp Realty is a cloud-based real estate brokerage that operates virtually.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of eXp World Holdings?
faq.answer: Glenn Sanford is the CEO of eXp World Holdings, Inc.

faq.question: Where is eXp Realty headquartered?
faq.answer: eXp Realty is headquartered in Bellingham, Washington, USA.

faq.question: What services does eXp Realty offer?
faq.answer: eXp Realty offers residential and commercial real estate brokerage services, along with a suite of agent tools.
